description: Adds a filter to the current song
noFilter: {emotes.error} | This is not a valid filter. You can get a list of all filters with {prefix}filter list
added: {emotes.success} | I am now activating the **{filter}** filter - Notice: the longer the song, the longer it takes to activate
removed: {emotes.success} | I am now deactivating the **{filter}** filter - Notice: the longer the song, the longer it takes to deactivate
allOn: {emotes.success} | I am now activating all filters - note, this takes a moment
allOff: {emotes.success} | I am now deactivating all filters - note, this takes a moment
